name: Paladin Name Generator
description: Craft a name worthy of a righteous champion! Our Paladin Name Generator conjures forth monikers brimming with honor, valor, and a touch of divine sparkle. Perfect for your next D&D character, fantasy novel, or just embracing your inner knight in shining armor.  Unleash your inner hero!
introduction: Step into the light!  Are you ready to forge a legend?  This generator is your forge, hammering out names that resonate with justice and smite the forces of darkness. Whether you're a devout warrior of the faith or simply admire the Paladin's code, find the perfect name to embody your righteous path. Prepare for epic quests and vanquished foes!
howToUse: Marvel at the awesomeness of the name that appears.
If the heavens haven't parted and angels aren't singing, click 'Generate' again. Keep going until a name truly speaks to your soul.
Copy and paste your chosen name into your character sheet, novel, or social media profile.  Spread the light!
Go forth and be awesome!  (Seriously, we expect great things.)

faqs.question: What kind of names does this generator create?
faqs.answer: Think noble, chivalrous, and a little bit mystical. We're aiming for names that sound like they belong to someone who's sworn an oath to protect the innocent and uphold the light. Expect a blend of classic fantasy and a touch of divine inspiration.

faqs.question: Can I use these names for commercial purposes (like in a book or game)?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Once the generator spits out a name, it's all yours. Feel free to use it in your creative projects, no attribution required (though we always appreciate a shout-out!).

faqs.question: The names are too similar.  Can I get more variety?
faqs.answer: Keep hitting that 'Generate' button! The algorithm is designed to provide a wide range of combinations.  If you're *still* not happy, try mixing and matching parts of different names that you like.  Get creative!

faqs.question: Are these names specific to any particular fantasy setting?
faqs.answer: Nope! These names are designed to be versatile and fit into a variety of fantasy worlds. They'll work just as well in a classic medieval setting as they will in a more unique and imaginative world.

faqs.question: I found a name I love, but I want to tweak it slightly. Is that okay?
faqs.answer: Of course! Consider this generator a starting point. Feel free to modify the names to perfectly suit your character or story. Add a middle name, change a vowel, or even combine parts of multiple names. The possibilities are endless!

faqs.question: Will this generator make me a better roleplayer?
faqs.answer: While we can't guarantee +5 to your roleplaying skills, a great name is a fantastic first step! It can help you get into character and inspire you to create a more compelling backstory. So, yes, in a way, it *can* make you a better roleplayer. Maybe.
